verses.text: \w Keep|strong="H1961"\w* \w thy|strong="H6440"\w* foot \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* goest \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w draw|strong="H3318"\w* nigh \w to|strong="H3318"\w* hear \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w better|strong="H5921"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H1697"\w* fools: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* know \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* evil.

\w Be|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* rash \w with|strong="H1697"\w* thy month, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* let \w not|strong="H3588"\w* thine heart \w be|strong="H1697"\w* hasty \w to|strong="H1697"\w* utter \w any|strong="H1697"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* before God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w upon|strong="H1697"\w* earth: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* let thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* few.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dream cometh \w with|strong="H7999"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H5088"\w* business; \w and|strong="H5088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*’s voice \w with|strong="H7999"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H5088"\w* words.

When thou \w vowest|strong="H5087"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* \w unto|strong="H2896"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, defer \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H2896"\w* \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*; \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* fools: \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* which thou \w vowest|strong="H5087"\w*.

\w Better|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shouldest \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w vow|strong="H3027"\w*, \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shouldest \w vow|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w*.

Suffer \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* mouth \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* flesh \w to|strong="H1697"\w* sin; neither \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* before \w the|strong="H3588"\w* angel, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* error: wherefore \w should|strong="H3588"\w* God \w be|strong="H1697"\w* angry \w at|strong="H2472"\w* \w thy|strong="H7235"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w thine|strong="H7235"\w* hands?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \add thus it cometh to pass \add*\w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H5921"\w* dreams \w and|strong="H4941"\w* vanities \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w many|strong="H7200"\w* words: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* fear \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* God.

\w If|strong="H1931"\w* thou seest \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oppression \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* violent taking \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* judgment \w and|strong="H4428"\w* justice \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* province, marvel not \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* matter: \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* higher \w than|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high regardeth; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* higher \w than|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* profit \w of|strong="H1995"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* earth \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w all|strong="H1571"\w*: \w the|strong="H1571"\w* king \add himself \add*\w is|strong="H2088"\w* served \w by|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* field.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* loveth silver \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* satisfied \w with|strong="H5869"\w* silver; \w nor|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* loveth \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*: \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* vanity.

\w When|strong="H7235"\w* goods \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*, \w they|strong="H5647"\w* \w are|strong="H6223"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* \w that|strong="H5647"\w* eat \w them|strong="H5647"\w*: \w and|strong="H5647"\w* what advantage is there \w to|strong="H7235"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* owner thereof, saving \w the|strong="H5647"\w* beholding \add of them \add*\w with|strong="H5647"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* eyes?

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* labouring \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* sweet, \w whether|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3426"\w* eat little \w or|strong="H7200"\w* much: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* fulness \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w rich|strong="H6239"\w* \w will|strong="H8121"\w* \w not|strong="H7200"\w* suffer \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7200"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grievous|strong="H7451"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* seen \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* sun, \add namely\add*, \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* kept \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* owner thereof \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*:

\w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* riches perish \w by|strong="H3027"\w* evil adventure; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* if \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w hath|strong="H3027"\w* \w begotten|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* son, \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w forth|strong="H3212"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother’s womb, naked \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w labour|strong="H5998"\w*, \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w carry|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* hand.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3708"\w* evil, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* points \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* came, \w so|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* go: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w what|strong="H1571"\w* profit hath \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* laboureth \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wind?

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* eateth \w in|strong="H3117"\w* darkness, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* sore vexed \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w hath|strong="H2416"\w* sickness \w and|strong="H3117"\w* wrath.

Behold, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* seen \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* good \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* comely \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* eat \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* drink, \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* enjoy good \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w labour|strong="H5999"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* laboureth \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sun, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w hath|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H2416"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H2416"\w* given riches \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w hath|strong="H2416"\w* given \w him|strong="H7235"\w* power \w to|strong="H3820"\w* eat \w thereof|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w take|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* portion, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8057"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* labour; \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* gift \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.
For he shall not much remember the days of his life; because God answereth \add him \add*in the joy of his heart.
